tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionData (
  building_id INT,
  consumption_date DATE,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE EfficiencyReport (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    efficiency_score DECIMAL,
    recommendation TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES BuildingInformation(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyReadings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    reading_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    energy_consumption DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Buildings(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SensorReadings (
    sensor_reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT NOT NULL,
    reading_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    alert_message TEXT NOT NULL,
    alert_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Buildings(building_id)
);
